description.narrative: Funding under this proposal supports the effectiveness and partnership of the Australian aid program in Vietnam. The funding will be provided for the following activities: small activities to respond to requests for assistance from government agencies, provinces, NGOs as identified by DFAT followed by Vietnam Aid Investment Plan; consultancy services and complementary activities to support the effectiveness of ongoing activities appropriate to emerging needs of the program; visit, workshops and conferences to promote information and experience sharing, program learning and policy dialogue; sector and program development and management support; and support DFAT Vietnam public diplomacy goals. The total value of this initiative is $3.0 million over 4 years, starting 2013-14.
